sections.heading: Employers; evasion of law; what constitutes; exceptions
sections.text: Any person, firm, or corporation creating or carrying into operation any scheme, artifice, or device to enable him or her, them, or it to execute work without being responsible to the workers for the provisions of the Nebraska Workers' Compensa

sections.heading: not include owner who requires contractor to take out compensation insurance, or contractor who requires subcontractor to do so
sections.text: Matthews v. G. A. Crancer Co., 117 Neb. 805, 223 N.W. 661 (1929).
